verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w haughty|strong="H7311"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lofty|strong="H7311"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w things|strong="H1419"\w*, \w things|strong="H1419"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w wonderful|strong="H6381"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

Yes, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* soothed \w and|strong="H5315"\w* stilled \w myself|strong="H5315"\w*, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* young \w child|strong="H1580"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* motherâ€™s lap; \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* young \w child|strong="H1580"\w* am \w I|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.
